channel.title: HELP ME PLZ i cant get the server to take my changes
channel.description:
hey all i have my server up and running but when i make a change to the code it doesnt take to the server
for instance when i change character settings to make mod in character files i save it when server isnt on and then i turn server on and my changes never changed... i also changed the xp rate and nothing happened still the same xp rate zzz i cant figure it out unless i need to run my compiler, but it doesnt work ive dled 3 of em and none work latest one i got says i need java 5.0 or 6.0 with updates and i have java 6.0 update 4 so i dont understand is there a compiler made to work with 6.0 u4???
